thumb.title: [TAS] SNES Chrono Trigger "save glitch" by arandomgameTASer in 03:27.59
thumb.description: 転載元https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wzYmZHBTALQ以下説明文This is a tool-assisted speedrun. For more information, see https://tasvideos.org/6703MTAS originally published on 2025-08-24While Chrono Trigger (1995) usually takes days to complete, Crono decided he'd rather not have to sit through all the unnecessary stuff, like long cutscenes, unskippable boss fights and key plot events, so he did it in three minutes instead.This is a little over 30 frame improvement over the previous publication ( https://tasvideos.org/2047M ) that utilizes a save glitch to reach one of the endings in this game very quickly.
thumb.last_res_body: これは誘拐犯 エンディングのほ... 当たり前のように... 別大陸がY座標続き... ﾊｯで丁度ジャンプ... 何が起こったかは... ええ… ！？ お祭り見て回って...

tags.tag: エンディングだぞ、泣けよ
